replies.body:
My question is why only add this to ranked/normal rift games?
If they're going to the effort to add it, they might as well add it all permanent or recurring game modes.

If I had to guess it would come down to storage and the value of that storage, since the sheer amount of game data would be monstrous, chance are riot are also using this data for themselves to help with balancing, and they are simply allowing access to the data, so its a double benefit since the game is balanced around summoners rift.

I also doubt people would actually use the info for ARAM at all, aside from the occasional "oh hey that's cool" moment, and similarly twisted treeline would see a much lower use, since most players only play 3v3 as a short change of pace before returning to summoners rift. I should also point out this isn't to say riot doesn't look at the data for these game modes, but more likely they only store the bulk of the data for only a short time, or don't record as much data for those game modes, and thus isn't worth releasing minimal data, since as players the general mentality is to keep asking for more.

Of course this is mostly speculation on my part, so I could be wrong as to the reasoning.
My starts are on par or even better than challenger and I am silver 3. So this just annoys me more of why I cannot climb.
